text: Peter van Straaten (25 March 1935 - 8 December 2016) was a Dutch cartoonist and comics artist. He was best known for his political cartoons as well as his satirical observations of everyday people. He also had a newspaper comic strip Vader & Zoon, which ran in Het Parool for almost two decades. Van Straaten announced his retirement on 2 August 2016. He died four months later on 8 December in Amsterdam, at the age of 81.Bas Schuddeboom & Kjell Knudde, "Peter van Straaten", Lambiek, 2016.
